source.model.mech¶

This module contains continuous-time models for mechanical subsystems.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Mechanics

Mechanical subsystem.
class source.model.mech.Mechanics(pars)[source]¶

Mechanical subsystem.

This models an equation of motion for stiff mechanics.

J¶

Total moment of inertia.

Type

float

B¶

Viscous damping coefficient.

Type

float

tau_L_ext¶

External load torque as a function of time, tau_L_ext(t). If not defined, tau_L_ext(t) = 0 is used.

Type

function

w_M0¶

Initial value of the rotor angular speed.

Type

float

theta_M0¶

Initial value of the rotor angle.

Type

float

Parameters

pars (ModelData object) – Contains the mechanics data.

f(self, t, w_M, tau_M)[source]¶

Compute the state derivative.

Parameters

  • t (float) – Time.

  • w_M (float) – Rotor angular speed (in mechanical rad/s).

  • tau_M (float) – Electromagnetic torque.

Returns

Time derivative of the state vector.

Return type

list, length 2

meas_speed(self)[source]¶

Measure the rotor speed.

This returns the rotor speed at the end of the sampling period.

Returns

w_M0 – Rotor angular speed (in mechanical rad/s).

Return type

float

meas_position(self)[source]¶

Measure the rotor angle.

This returns the rotor angle at the end of the sampling period.

Returns

theta_M0 – Rotor angle (in mechanical rad).

Return type

float

Return str(self).
